data.title: Armenia
data.text:
Yerevan, Armenia â€“ Shirakamut Consulting

About us: Shirakamut Consulting specializes in providing services on business planning, business and assets valuation, investment and financial analysis, bookkeeping, insurance and introduction of analytical software.

The Company has licenses to conduct valuation of movable and immovable property and act as a insurance broker.

The Company is a certified consultant of the following organizations;

LLC ArmRosgazprom

EBRD Advis for Small Business (ABS) of the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development

The Center for Fostering Small and Medium-sized Business under the RF Ministry of Economics.

Various promotion programs of governments of France, the Netherlands and Germany

LLC ArmSwissBank

High-qualified experts provide advisory services for such international organizations as GIZ (valuation of implemented projects of the German Government), Save the Children (valuation of projects to obtain grants), ICARE (Agrobusiness Guide of Armenia) and UNIDO (consulting support).

Starting from 2008, the Company has developed business plans for many commercial banks, as well as national and international organizations, the most important of which are as follows:

Anti-crisis Center governed by the Prime-Minister of the Republic of Armenia

EBRD European Bank for Reconstruction and Development

OPIC Overseas Private Investment Corporation

European private investment funds

The ISTC program (the International Science and Technology Center) for commercialization of R&D

SRDF program for financing innovation development programs

Commercial banks of Armenia, Russia, Georgia, Czechia, Germany and the USA

Since December 2015, Shirakamut has been operating under FinExpertiza brand, retaining its original name.

Our services:

Business services:

Business plan development

Business plan expert review

Feasibility studies

Leasing proposals development

Franchising proposals development

Bookkeeping services:

Maintenance of bookkeeping

Bookkeeping restoration

Management accounting

Analysis of management systems

Automation of management systems

Business and assets valuation:

Business valuation

Valuation of real estate, buildings, premises

Valuation of machinery and equipment

Valuation of vehicles

Revaluation of fixed assets

Credit consulting:

Preparation of credit packages

Negotiations with banks

Debt restructuring

Preparation of cash flow statements

Consultations on import and export transactions

Insurance services:

Vehicle insurance (Comprehensive cover)

Health insurance

Real estate insurance

Cargo insurance

Marketing:

Industry markets research

Consumer analysis

Price analysis

Assessment of effectiveness of advertising campaigns

Development of a marketing strategy

Legal services:

Consultations on corporate law

Legal support for business activities of entities

Foundation and reorganization of legal entities, business, enterprises

Legal support for investment projects

Consultations on participation in and implementation of public procurement

Project management and software products:

Project management

Software for business and audit

Management of processes

Quality management

Our Leadership Team:
